REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1887 reute r f BC-<WHIPPANY-PAPER-BOARD 03-16 0042

TEXT.TITLE: <WHIPPANY PAPER BOARD CO INC> MERGER APPROVED
TEXT.BODY: Whippany Paper Board Co Inc said shareholders at a special meeting approved a merger into NPN Inc for 2.50 dlrs per share. NPN acquired control of Whippany in a recent tender offer. Reuter
